Other (local idiosyncrasies): Your partner must come to your appointment with you and bring their passport.

Additional documentation: premarital medical certificate*partner's premarital medical certificate

Postal description: we post the CNI to client when able to issue it

We offer both in person and postal applications, postal only partly as someone has to collect the document to take it to the Croatian Ministry of Foreign Affairs to verify our stamp and signature. Postal applications are only part of the process - the UKN has to be in Croatia and can sign the Notice of Marriage in front of us or a Croatian public notary.

Other (local idiosyncrasies): Check with your wedding officiant (the person conducting your ceremony) or venue how long your affirmation is valid for as it varies in different regions.

Additional documentation: premarital medical certificate*partner's premarital medical certificate*photo ID (in addition to your UK passport)

Postal description: British National can do the notice of marriage with a local notary public. The Notice of Marriage (NOM) and Affirmation signed by the Notary Public, with supporting documents, are sent to our office by the applicant. We post their NOM and after 7 clear days we issue the CNI.

Additional documentation: partner's national ID that includes their address

Postal description: We accept notice of marriage and affidavits that are notarised to be posted to us to then analyse documents for  CNI.

Country: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

Duration: 3 or 6 months (you should check with your civil registry)

Country: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

Postal description: the CNI, they do the affirmation with a local notary and send that to us for displaying and issuing of CNI

Additional documentation: premarital medical certificate*partner's premarital medical certificate
